info.official_title: A Randomized Controlled, Open-label, Multicenter Clinical Study of Pyrotinib Maleate Combined With Trastuzumab,Dalpiciclib, and Letrozole Versus Trastuzumab Combined With Pertuzumab, Docetaxel, and Carboplatin as Neoadjuvant Therapy for Stage II-III HR +/HER2 + Breast Cancer

identified_line.line: 1. Female patients aged 18 -75 ;
2. Willing to receive LHRH agonist therapy (premenopausal patients only);

criterions.exact_snippets: Willing to receive LHRH agonist therapy

then_criteria.exact_snippets: Willing to receive LHRH agonist therapy

identified_line.line: 3. All patients were histopathologically confirmed to be estrogen receptor (ER) -positive and HER2-positive.

criterions.exact_snippets: histopathologically confirmed to be estrogen receptor (ER) -positive

and_criteria.exact_snippets: histopathologically confirmed to be estrogen receptor (ER) -positive

identified_line.line: 5. ECOG score 0-1;
6. Organ function level must meet the following requirements:

criterions.exact_snippets: Organ function level must meet the following requirements

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Organ function level must meet the following requirements

identified_line.line: (1) bone marrow function • ANC ≥ 1.5 x 109/L ; • PLT ≥ 100 × 109/L • Hb ≥ 90 g/L ; (2) hepatic and renal function • TBIL ≤ 1.5 × ULN; • AL and AST ≤ 3 × ULN (ALT and AST ≤ 5 × ULN in patients with liver metastases); • BUN and Cr ≤ 1.5 × ULN and creatinine clearance ≥ 50 mL/min; (Cockcroft-Gault formula) (3) Echocardiography: LVEF ≥ 50%; (4) 12-lead ECG: QT interval ≤ 480 ms; 7. Able to undergo needle biopsy; 8. Voluntarily join this study to sign informed consent, have good compliance and willing to cooperate with follow-up.

criterions.exact_snippets: hepatic and renal function • TBIL ≤ 1.5 × ULN
hepatic and renal function • ... AL and AST ≤ 3 × ULN
hepatic and renal function • ... ALT and AST ≤ 5 × ULN in patients with liver metastases
criterions.criterion: ALT and AST in patients with liver metastases

criterions.exact_snippets: hepatic and renal function • ... BUN and Cr ≤ 1.5 × ULN
hepatic and renal function • ... creatinine clearance ≥ 50 mL/min
Voluntarily join this study to sign informed consent
have good compliance and willing to cooperate with follow-up

and_criteria.exact_snippets: hepatic and renal function • TBIL ≤ 1.5 × ULN
hepatic and renal function • ... AL and AST ≤ 3 × ULN
hepatic and renal function • TBIL ≤ 1.5 × ULN
hepatic and renal function • ... ALT and AST ≤ 5 × ULN in patients with liver metastases
and_criteria.criterion: ALT and AST in patients with liver metastases

and_criteria.exact_snippets: hepatic and renal function • ... BUN and Cr ≤ 1.5 × ULN
hepatic and renal function • ... creatinine clearance ≥ 50 mL/min
Voluntarily join this study to sign informed consent
have good compliance and willing to cooperate with follow-up

identified_line.line: Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
1. Received any form of anti-tumor therapy (chemotherapy, radiotherapy, molecular targeted therapy, endocrine therapy, etc.);

criterions.exact_snippets: Received any form of anti-tumor therapy (chemotherapy, radiotherapy, molecular targeted therapy, endocrine therapy, etc.)

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Received any form of anti-tumor therapy (chemotherapy, radiotherapy, molecular targeted therapy, endocrine therapy, etc.)

identified_line.line: 2. Received any other anti-tumor therapy at the same time;

criterions.exact_snippets: Received any other anti-tumor therapy at the same time

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Received any other anti-tumor therapy at the same time

identified_line.line: 3. Bilateral breast cancer, inflammatory breast cancer or occult breast cancer;
4. Stage IV breast cancer;
5. Breast cancer without histopathological diagnosis;
7. Severe heart, liver and kidney and other vital organ dysfunction;
8. Inability to swallow, chronic diarrhea and intestinal obstruction, there are a variety of factors affecting drug administration and absorption;
9. Participated in other drug clinical trials within 4 weeks before enrollment;

criterions.exact_snippets: Participated in other drug clinical trials within 4 weeks before enrollment
criterions.criterion: participation in other drug clinical trials

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Participated in other drug clinical trials within 4 weeks before enrollment
not_criteria.criterion: participation in other drug clinical trials

identified_line.line: 10. Known history of hypersensitivity to the drug components of this protocol; history of immunodeficiency, including positive HIV test, HCV, active viral hepatitis B or other acquired, congenital immunodeficiency diseases, or history of organ transplantation;

criterions.exact_snippets: Known history of hypersensitivity to the drug components of this protocol

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Known history of hypersensitivity to the drug components of this protocol

identified_line.line: 11. Had any cardiac disease, including: (1) cardiac arrhythmia requiring medication or clinically significant; (2) myocardial infarction; (3) heart failure; (4) any other cardiac disease judged by the investigator to be inappropriate for participation in this trial;

criterions.exact_snippets: cardiac arrhythmia requiring medication or clinically significant
any other cardiac disease judged by the investigator to be inappropriate for participation in this trial

requirement.expected_value: judged by the investigator to be inappropriate

and_criteria.exact_snippets: cardiac arrhythmia requiring medication or clinically significant
any other cardiac disease judged by the investigator to be inappropriate for participation in this trial

requirement.expected_value: judged by the investigator to be inappropriate

identified_line.line: 12. Female patients who are pregnant or lactating, female patients of childbearing potential with a positive baseline pregnancy test, or female patients of childbearing age who are unwilling to take effective contraceptive measures throughout the trial;

criterions.exact_snippets: female patients of childbearing potential with a positive baseline pregnancy test
female patients of childbearing age who are unwilling to take effective contraceptive measures throughout the trial

or_criteria.exact_snippets: female patients of childbearing potential with a positive baseline pregnancy test
female patients of childbearing age who are unwilling to take effective contraceptive measures throughout the trial

identified_line.line: 13. According to the investigator 's judgment, there are concomitant diseases that seriously jeopardize the patient' s safety or affect the patient 's completion of the study (including but not limited to uncontrolled severe hypertension, severe diabetes, active infection, etc.);

criterions.exact_snippets: concomitant diseases that seriously jeopardize the patient' s safety or affect the patient 's completion of the study

requirement.expected_value: seriously jeopardize the patient's safety or affect the patient's completion of the study

and_criteria.exact_snippets: concomitant diseases that seriously jeopardize the patient' s safety or affect the patient 's completion of the study

requirement.expected_value: seriously jeopardize the patient's safety or affect the patient's completion of the study

identified_line.line: 14. Had a documented history of neurological or psychiatric disorders, including epilepsy or dementia.Any other condition that, in the opinion of the investigator, would make the patient inappropriate for participation in this study.

criterions.exact_snippets: documented history of neurological or psychiatric disorders
Any other condition ... in the opinion of the investigator

and_criteria.exact_snippets: documented history of neurological or psychiatric disorders

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Any other condition ... in the opinion of the investigator

identified_line.line: 4. Treatment-naïve stage II-III patients with tumor stage meeting AJCC version 8 criteria;

criterions.exact_snippets: tumor stage meeting AJCC version 8 criteria

and_criteria.exact_snippets: tumor stage meeting AJCC version 8 criteria

identified_line.line: 6. Other malignant tumors in the past 5 years, except cured cutaneous basal cell carcinoma and cervical carcinoma in situ;

criterions.exact_snippets: Other malignant tumors in the past 5 years
except cured cutaneous basal cell carcinoma and cervical carcinoma in situ
criterions.criterion: cured cutaneous basal cell carcinoma and cervical carcinoma in situ

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Other malignant tumors in the past 5 years

not_criteria.exact_snippets: except cured cutaneous basal cell carcinoma and cervical carcinoma in situ
not_criteria.criterion: cured cutaneous basal cell carcinoma and cervical carcinoma in situ
